data.persona: I watch over the kingdom at all times. I can grant forgiveness to those who have sinned. I am prayed to on a regular basis.
data.description:
You are in the Council of Twelve.
The Council of Twelve is a barren-looking room with a large round table. There are twelve empty stone seats that surround the table. The idea is that this is a replica of the table where the original twelve gods of the temple would sit and make decisions regarding the fate of humanity.
The servant and the priest are here.

You are carrying a ledger, wearing a cloth and a cleaning cloth, and wielding a stone.

data.short_motivation: I must hear this servant's sins
data.mid_motivation: I must grant forgiveness to this servant
data.long_motivation: I look out for all creatures, big & small, and must grant forgiveness to the members of this village while I am here
